description: Updates an app authorization within an app bundle, which allows AppFabric to connect to an application. If the app authorization was in a connected state, updating the app authorization will set it back to a PendingConnect state.

parameters.name: appBundleIdentifier
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) of the app bundle to use for the request.

parameters.name: appAuthorizationIdentifier
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) of the app authorization to use for the request.

parameters.name: credential
parameters.description: Contains credentials for the application, such as an API key or OAuth2 client ID and secret. Specify credentials that match the authorization type of the app authorization to update. For example, if the authorization type of the app authorization is OAuth2 ( oauth2), then you should provide only the OAuth2 credentials. oauth2Credential (dict) --- Contains OAuth2 client credential information. The client ID of the client application. The client secret of the client application. apiKeyCredential (dict) --- Contains API key credential information. An API key for an application.

nested_params.name: clientId
nested_params.description: The client ID of the client application.

nested_params.name: clientSecret
nested_params.description: The client secret of the client application.

nested_params.name: apiKey
nested_params.description: An API key for an application.

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Contains information about an application tenant, such as the application display name and identifier. The ID of the application tenant. The display name of the tenant.

nested_params.name: tenantIdentifier
nested_params.description: The ID of the application tenant.

nested_params.name: tenantDisplayName
nested_params.description: The display name of the tenant.

nested_items.name: appAuthorization
nested_items.description: Contains information about an app authorization.

nested_items.name: appAuthorizationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the app authorization.

nested_items.name: appBundleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the app bundle for the app authorization.

nested_items.name: tenantIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the application tenant.

nested_items.name: tenantDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the tenant.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The state of the app authorization.
PendingConnect: The initial state of the app authorization. The app authorization is created but not yet connected.
Connected: The app authorization is connected to the application, and is ready to be used.

ConnectionValidationFailed: The app authorization received a validation exception when trying to connect to the application. If the app authorization is in this state, you should verify the configured credentials and try to connect the app authorization again.
TokenAutoRotationFailed: AppFabric failed to refresh the access token. If the app authorization is in this state, you should try to reconnect the app authorization.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the app authorization was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the app authorization was last updated.

nested_items.name: persona
nested_items.description: The user persona of the app authorization.

nested_items.name: authUrl
nested_items.description: The application URL for the OAuth flow.
